channel.title: Welcome to the Axoloti Community
channel.description:
This community board is intended to provide a home for all support, discussions and questions for all Axoloti users about the Axoloti platform. You will find categories to discuss the hardware, the software and patches created for Axoloti. Axoloti was created as a community project, where we can all help and inspire each other, and share ideas in an open environment. Support of the platform is provided through this forum, please read the support guidelines to help this to be an efficient process.
More Information about Axoloti can be found about Axoloti at : [Axoloti.com][1]
We hope this forum will provide a friendly and open forum for discussion, to encourage this please ensure you following [our posting guidelines][2], and if you find anything in breach of these please report the post.
Most importantly, have fun and enjoy exploring Axoloti.
[1]: http://axoloti.com [2]: http://community.axoloti.com/guidelines
